TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BooleanSwitch extends System.Diagnostics.Switch

summary.span: 提供简单的打开/关闭开关来控制调试和跟踪输出。

span.span: Provides a simple on/off switch that controls debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 布尔型跟踪开关可用于启用或禁用基于其重要性的消息。You can use a Boolean trace switch to enable or disable messages based on their importance. 使用属性来获取开关的当前值。Use the property to get the current value of the switch. 可以启用或禁用通过应用程序配置文件，然后使用已配置的在应用程序中的值。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured value in your application. 另外，可以创建在您的代码和集属性直接以检测特定部分的代码。Alternately, you can create a in your code and set the property directly to instrument a specific section of code. 若要配置，编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除一个开关，设置开关的值，或清除所有交换机之前设置应用程序。Within this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 此示例配置节定义与属性设置为`mySwitch`并且值设置为`true`。This example configuration section defines a with the property set to `mySwitch` and the value set to `true`. 在应用程序中，可以使用已配置的开关值，通过创建具有相同的名称，如下面的代码示例中所示。Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following code example. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 默认情况下，属性使用配置文件中指定的值设置。By default, the property is set using the value specified in the configuration file. 值为 0，则设置配置开关属性设置为`false`; 以非零值来设置配置开关属性设置为`true`。Configure the switch with a value of 0 to set the property to `false`; configure the switch with a nonzero value to set the property to `true`. 如果构造函数不能在配置文件中，查找初始开关设置属性的新开关设置为`false`默认情况下。If the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to `false` by default. 必须启用跟踪或调试要使用交换机。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 下面的语法是特定的编译器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用除 C# 或 Visual Basic 编译器，请参阅您的编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，也可以添加标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用 C# 中的跟踪，请添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. > [!NOTE] > 这些调试和跟踪编译器开关时将不再需要使用中隔离的类。These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the class in isolation. 它们仅需要结合或有条件地编译的方法。They are only required in conjunction with or methods that are conditionally compiled. 检测应用程序的详细信息，请参阅和。For more information on instrumenting your application, see and . 有关配置和使用跟踪开关的详细信息，请参阅[跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 若要提高性能，可以使成员`static`在类中。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并使用该开关确定是否要打印一条错误消息。The following example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在类级别上创建交换机。You create the switch at the class level. `Main`方法将传递到其位置`MyMethod`，其输出一条错误消息，并发生错误的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的显示名称和说明初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name and description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您创建，则`displayName`参数用来查找初始交换机设置。When you create a , the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings. 如果构造函数找不到初始设置属性设置为`false`（禁用）。If the constructor cannot find initial settings, the property is set to `false` (disabled). 若要设置的级别应用，编辑配置文件与应用程序的名称相对应。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加一个开关和将其值设置、 删除一个开关，或清除所有交换机以前由应用程序设置。Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 创建的开关均应为`static`。The switches you created should be `static`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并使用该开关确定是否要打印一条错误消息。The following example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在类级别上创建交换机。The switch is created at the class level. `Main`方法将传递到其位置`MyMethod`，其输出一条错误消息，并发生错误的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的显示名称、说明和默认开关值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name, description, and default switch value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数用于设置的值属性，并`description`参数用于设置的值属性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property. `defaultSwitchValue`参数是保存为字段，用于初始化上第一次引用的属性。The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the property on first reference. 有关构造函数使用的详细信息，请参阅构造函数。For more information about constructor use, see the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Enabled { get; set; }
.property instance bool Enabled
Public Property Enabled As Boolean
public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示开关已启用还是已禁用的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the switch is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果开关已启用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the switch is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此字段设置为`false`（禁用）。By default, this field is set to `false` (disabled). 若要启用此开关，此字段的值分配为`true`。To enable the switch, assign this field the value of `true`. 若要禁用此开关，分配到值`false`。To disable the switch, assign the value to `false`. 此属性的值由派生类的属性的值。The value of this property is determined by the value of the base class property . > [!NOTE] > 此方法使用标志，用于防止不受信任的代码中调用; 仅直接调用方需要具有权限。This method uses the flag to prevent being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果你的代码可以从部分受信任代码调用，不传递的用户输入类而不进行验证的方法。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass the user input to class methods without validation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并使用该开关确定是否要打印一条错误消息。The following code example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在类级别上创建交换机。The switch is created at the class level. `Main`方法将传递到其位置`MyMethod`，这将打印一条错误消息和错误发生的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and the location where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有正确的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permission.

permission.span: 用于与非托管代码的操作。

override this.OnValueChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 确定 属性的新值是否可以被解析为一个布尔值。

span.span: Determines whether the new value of the property can be parsed as a Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定新值是否为布尔值 （"false"或"true"） 的有效字符串表示形式。The method determines whether the new value is a valid string representation of a Boolean value ("false" or "true"). 因此，该方法将设置如果属性设置为 0 或 1。If so, the method sets the property to 0 or 1. 否则，调用基方法，它将字符串值转换为整数值，然后将其用于设置属性。Otherwise, the base method is called, which converts the string value to an integer value, which is then used to set the property.
